it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Damageable, MatchModeChangedListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Damageable, MatchModeChangedListener
    This class represents the player entity, storing all info about its status during the match

      Player(PlayerInfo info)

        a list containing the DamageToken received so far, the list will be empty if there are none

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon(Weapon weapon,
                       java.util.List<Ammo> ammos,
                       java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups,
                       Weapon discardedWeapon)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon when he already has 3, exchanging it for one of those he owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon that the player is buying
        ammos - the cost the player is paying with ammos
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups
        discardedWeapon - the Weapon the player is giving up for the new one

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon(Weapon weapon,
                       java.util.List<Ammo> ammos,
                       java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon, given that he has less than 3 weapons
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon that the player is buying
        ammos - the cost the player is paying with ammos
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups
